bio.en: Transforming your ideas into high-quality, high-performance websites. Specialized in building custom business solutions with 2.5 years of technical expertise.
bio.id: Bantu bisnis lo naik level lewat website yang gak cuma cakep, tapi juga kenceng. Spesialis solusi custom dengan pengalaman 2.5 tahun di industri digital, siap eksekusi ide lo jadi nyata!

desc.en: Showcase your skills & work in style. Make HR or clients fall in love at first sight.
desc.id: Pamerin skill & karya lo dengan gaya! Bikin HR atau klien langsung jatuh cinta pandangan pertama.

desc.en: Convert visitors into buyers. Professional design to boost trust & business conversions.
desc.id: Sulap pengunjung jadi pembeli. Desain profesional buat naikin trust & konversi bisnis lo.

desc.en: Sell event tickets or cheki slots fully automatically. No more manual recap hassle!
desc.id: Jualan tiket event atau slot cheki jadi full otomatis. Gak perlu ribet rekap manual lagi!

desc.en: Make them melt on birthdays or valentine's. Interactive web that will be remembered forever.
desc.id: Bikin doi meleleh pas ultah atau valentine. Web interaktif yang bakal dikenang selamanya.

desc.en: Display your products without limits. Click to order, practical for non-shipping businesses.
desc.id: Pajang produk atau menu lo tanpa batas. Order tinggal klik, praktis buat bisnis sat-set.

desc.en: Online gathering place for your fanbase or community. Complete features, simpler bonding!
desc.id: Wadah ngumpul online buat fanbase atau komunitas lo. Fitur lengkap, makin solid!

desc.en: High-quality websites starting from just 200k IDR.
desc.id: Web mantul mulai 200rb-an. Pas bet buat kantong pelajar & UMKM.

desc.en: Guaranteed fast communication and timely delivery.
desc.id: Chat langsung bales, ngerjain ga pake lelet. Anti ghosting club!

desc.en: Refining until it matches your vision perfectly.
desc.id: Gas terus revisi sampe lo bilang 'NAH INI BARU MANTAP!'.

desc.en: Get extra pages and abundant features for free.
desc.id: Gratis nambah halaman plus fitur seabrek biar web lo makin menyala abangku!
Udah dapet gratis hosting! Web langsung online tanpa bayar server lagi.
Settingan SEO tingkat dewa biar nangkring di page one Google.

cta_desc.en: Ready to take your business online? Contact me now to discuss your project.
cta_desc.id: Udah siap go online? Chat gue sekarang buat ngobrolin ide liar lo, gasss!
